title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Mr. Masudur Rahman

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Mr. Masudur Rahman, High Commissioner of Bangladesh to Nigeria today, 22nd February, 2024.
Discussions centred on strengthening collaboration between Nigeria and Bangladesh in the areas of agriculture & food processing, deep sea fishing, pharmaceuticals, trade, defence, ICT, and textiles among others.
